text:
[Verse]
Drops fall from the sky
Feel the rhythm start
Laughing until we cry
Dancing in the dark

[Verse 2]
Barefoot on the ground
Splashing through the night
Happiness we've found
Underneath the light

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Feel the cool on our skin
Forget all the pain
Let the joy begin

[Verse 3]
Puddles at our feet
Twirl and spin around
Hear the heartbeat beat
In this small town

[Chorus]
We are dancing in the rain
Feel the cool on our skin
Forget all the pain
Let the joy begin

[Bridge]
Love the stormy weather
Together we'll remain
Embrace it forever
We are dancing in the rain
title: Dancing in the Rain
